item.title: The influence of multi-factors on green investments
item.description: This is the first english blog, perhaps I am going to use it to record some skills. let’s try $a = b$

item.title: Chinese Blogs
item.description: Well, I have kept on writing blogs since from my post-graduate. It has been nearly for 5 years. In the past days, I was used to write Chinese blogs, which are more about the notes of online courses. Yeah, I always engoy taking online courses in Coursera, which has taught me a lot. I feel so grateful for that. For those what I learned and what I thought, I would try to take some notes to help me better understand them.

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Baoqiang Zhan 1 School of Economics and Management, Harbin Institute of Technology Email: 21b910010@stu.hit.edu.cn Competences & Languages Research Interests FinTech, Marketing-finance Interface, Business Analytics Research Methods Econometrics, Social Networks, Machine Learning Skills Data Crawling, Big Data Analysis, Natural Language Processing Programming Python, Stata, MatLab, R, SPSS Language IELTS: 6.5 (Good) Educational Background Sept. 2021 ~ Present, Ph.D. Candidate (Supervisor: Prof. Yongli Li) School of Economics and Management, Harbin Institute of Technology
